attributes.action: Revote for Scottish Independence with Higher Security at Count
attributes.additional_details:
With all the videos flooding in of people swapping votes and writing on ballot papers, I feel we should demand a revote as I feel we have been treated unfairly.

Whether you are a Yes or No voter, I don't think it is right that our votes were rigged by people with biased views and I think we are as deserving of our Yes vote being counted as the No voters are.

Don't sit back and let the Government and the public walk all over us. Take the first step to demanding our rights as Scottish people!
